properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
All glory laud and honour
to thee redeemer king,
to whom the lips of children
make sweet hosannas ring.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Thou art the King of Israel
thou David's royal son.
Who in the Lord's name
comest the King
and blessed one.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
The company of angels
are praising thee on high.
And mortal men and all
things created make reply.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
The people of the hebrews
with palms before thee went.
Our praise and prayer and
anthems before thee
we present.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
To thee before thy passion
they sung their
hymns of praise.
To thee now high exalted
our melody we raise.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Thou didst accept
their praises accept
the prayers we bring.
Who in all good delightest
thou good and gracious king.
